config = PyPIConfig('john', 'password', repository='http://localhost')
self.assertRaises(bento.errors.PyPIError, upload, 'foo.bin', 'bdist_dumb',
    self.package, config)
mock.patch('bento.pypi.upload_utils.urlopen', my_urlopen_factory(HTTPError(
    '', 404, 'url not found', {}, six.moves.StringIO())))
